articles.content: After folding and unfolding the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 200,000 times by hand, Korean YouTube channel Tech-it found that the folding phone's redesigned hinge and thinner design couldn't withstand rep… [+1930 chars]

articles.author: Shane O'Neill
articles.title: Is It Cheaper To Buy Ryobi Tools From Its Website Or Home Depot? - SlashGear
articles.description: There is very little difference in price between buying tools direct from Ryobi or shopping at Home Depot, although sales events can drive prices down.
articles.content: While it's not impossible to find a deal on Ryobi tools, the brand's website and Home Depot might still leave you a bit light in the wallet. As a result, other, potentially cheaper sources, such as A… [+1146 chars]
